alert.note: Alert for Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 17 at 1:09PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast South Carolina, including the following county, Colleton. * WHEN...Until 100 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 102 PM EDT, Emergency management reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. - Due to heavy rainfall last evening, flooding is occurring along Ireland Creek. Portions of Ireland Creek Drive, Ivanhoe Road and Sweat Street are closed. Additional water rises are possible through the afternoon and may impact homes and businesses near Ireland Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Walterboro.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
